abstract.t: Describes mitigations against spoofing attacks on DNS, as follows: (1) Prepending a random nonce to the question where a referral is probable. (2) Repeating the query, including techniques for handling non-deterministic responses. (3) Estimating the entropy available, taking into account (a) Observed packets with incorrect IDs. (b) Records where the owner name does not match the question. (c) The previous content of the cache.
